archive.label: Archive
archive.dialog.message.confirm: Are you sure you want to archive this content?
archive.dialog.message.published: This content is currently published and cannot be archived. Please unpublish this content manually before archiving.
archive.dialog.message.alreadyArchived: This content has already been archived.
archive.dialog.message.details: The content will be moved to the archive folder and marked as read-only. Original location information will be preserved.
archive.notification.permission: You do not have permission to archive this content
archive.notification.locked: Content is locked and cannot be archived
